subject: Re: Mini AMFM hack
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I was bored today and went out and bought one of these, i'm gonna post 
some of my files from a 5 minute session testing it out.  It was less 
than a ten minute modification to this radio shack radio and it works 
pretty good.  Let me know what you think of these files.

Thanx Sum,
-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Sumra Dume" <duck@...> wrote:
>
> Hi, 
> Just Hacked a radio shack model 12-469 
> Cut the Mute pin and presto a fm sweep cheap!
> 
> Cost 24.95 and about ten minutes time. 
> it's not perfect but it's not expensive.
> 
> I'll post the complete hack later this weekend!
> 
> -Sum
>
